title: Kamen no Ninja Akakage
synopsis: Red Shadow, created by Mitsuteru Yokoyama, is a ninja who wears a red-and-black costume and a stylized red mask. His adventures take place in Feudal Japan, and he and his ninja sidekicks Aokage and Shirokage fight evil warlords, wizards and daikaiju using modern high-tech gadgetry (a blatant oddity in a period setting).
staff: [['Ishizaki, Susumu', ['Director', ' Episode Director']], ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Yonetani, Yoshitomo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Suga, Yoshiyuki', ['Series Composition']]]
